title: JSON schema for Team Essentials: Required Extensions

required.description: List of extensions requirements. The identifier of an extension is always '${publisher}.${name}'. For example: 'msjsdiag.debugger-for-edge'.

recommendations.description: List of extensions recommendations. The identifier of an extension is always '${publisher}.${name}'. For example: 'msjsdiag.debugger-for-edge'.
